advices.title: Water & Weight
advices.content: Drinking water regularly, suppresses your appetite. Water contains no calories, hence, contributing significantly to weight loss.

advices.title: Water & Skin
advices.content: Water moisturises your skin and keeps it fresh. It helps maintain the elasticity and suppleness of the skin and prevents dryness.
